movies.title: Psycho
movies.description: A secretary embezzles money and checks into a remote motel run by a disturbed man.

movies.title: Vertigo
movies.description: A retired detective suffering from acrophobia investigates a mysterious woman.

movies.title: Rear Window
movies.description: A wheelchair-bound photographer spies on his neighbors and suspects a murder.

movies.title: North by Northwest
movies.description: A man is mistaken for a spy and pursued across the country.

movies.title: The Birds
movies.description: A wealthy socialite finds herself in a small town where birds start attacking people.

movies.title: Strangers on a Train
movies.description: Two men meet on a train and discuss swapping murders to avoid detection.

movies.title: Rope
movies.description: Two men commit murder and host a party with the body hidden in the room.

movies.title: Shadow of a Doubt
movies.description: A young woman suspects her charming uncle may be a murderer.

movies.title: The 39 Steps
movies.description: A man is wrongly accused of murder and must uncover a spy ring to clear his name.

movies.title: Rebecca
movies.description: A newlywed woman is haunted by her husband's first wife in a mysterious mansion.

movies.title: The Shining
movies.description: A writer and his family stay at an isolated hotel where supernatural forces drive him insane.

movies.title: A Clockwork Orange
movies.description: A violent delinquent undergoes an experimental reformation program.

movies.title: 2001: A Space Odyssey
movies.description: A mysterious monolith influences human evolution as astronauts journey into deep space.

movies.title: Full Metal Jacket
movies.description: A look at the dehumanizing effects of the Vietnam War on young soldiers.

movies.title: Dr. Strangelove
movies.description: A satirical look at Cold War paranoia and nuclear brinkmanship.

movies.title: Barry Lyndon
movies.description: An 18th-century Irish rogue attempts to climb the social ladder through various exploits.

movies.title: Paths of Glory
movies.description: A French officer in World War I defends his men against unjust accusations.

movies.title: The Killing
movies.description: A group of criminals plans a heist at a racetrack, but things go wrong.

movies.title: Eyes Wide Shut
movies.description: A doctor embarks on a night-long odyssey after a disturbing encounter at a masquerade party.

movies.title: Lolita
movies.description: A middle-aged man becomes infatuated with a 12-year-old girl, leading to a morally ambiguous relationship.

movies.title: The Magician
movies.description: A magician on a journey to discover the secrets of his craft.
